assertion.value: Kirsty McWalter, Megan T. Cho, Maria J. Guillen Sacoto, and Kristin G. Monaghan are employees of GeneDx, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of OPKO Health, Inc. The remaining authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
